:maxlength.description_zh: 原生属性，最大输入长度

:minlength.description_zh: 原生属性，最小输入长度

show-word-limit.description: Whether or not to display the input word count is only valid if type = "text" or type = "textarea".
show-word-limit.description_zh: 是否显示输入字数统计，只在 type = "text" 或 type = "textarea" 时有效

show-password.description: Whether to display the switch password icon
show-password.description_zh: 是否显示切换密码图标

:rows.description: Enter the number of lines in the box, which is valid only for type="textarea".
:rows.description_zh: 输入框行数，只对 type="textarea" 有效

autosize.description: Adaptive content height, valid only for type="textarea", can be passed in objects, e.g., { minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }
autosize.description_zh: 自适应内容高度，只对 type="textarea" 有效，可传入对象，如，{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }

readonly.description: Native attributes, whether they are read-only

max.description: Native attributes, set the maximum value

min.description: Native attributes, set the minimum value

step.description: Native property, which sets the legal numerical interval for the input field
step.description_zh: 原生属性，设置输入字段的合法数字间隔

resize.description: Controls whether it can be scaled by the user
resize.description_zh: 控制是否能被用户缩放

autofocus.description_zh: 原生属性，自动获取焦点

label.description: Enter the label text associated with the field

tabindex.description: Enter the size of the box, which is only valid when type!="textarea".
tabindex.description_zh: 输入框尺寸，只在 type!="textarea" 时有效

validate-event.description: Whether the validation of the form is triggered when input
validate-event.description_zh: 输入时是否触发表单的校验

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Makes the input out of focus

methods.name: select
methods.description_zh: 选中 input 中的文字

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 在 Input 失去焦点时触发

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 在 Input 获得焦点时触发

events.name: change
events.description: Triggers only when the input box loses focus or the user presses enter
events.description_zh: 仅在输入框失去焦点或用户按下回车时触发

events.name: input
events.description: Triggers when the Input value changes
events.description_zh: 在 Input 值改变时触发

events.name: clear
events.description: Triggers when the Clear button generated by the clearable property is clicked
events.description_zh: 在点击由 clearable 属性生成的清空按钮时触发

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: Enter the content of the header of the box

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: Enter the content at the end of the box

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: The input box is preceded by content

slots.name: append
slots.description: The input box is followed by the content
